publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1057 Donald Gorrie: Launch of East Kilbride Mail-That the Parliament values a vigorous local press throughout Scotland and welcomes new local newspapers, such as the new East Kilbride Mail, which increase the diversity of coverage of local news and issues in their area.

S2M-1057 Donald Gorrie: Launch of East Kilbride Mail-That the Parliament values a vigorous local press throughout Scotland and welcomes new local newspapers, such as the new East Kilbride Mail, which increase the diversity of coverage of local news and issues in their area.
S2M-1057 Launch of East Kilbride Mail (lodged on 17 March 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1057 Launch of East Kilbride Mail (lodged on 17 March 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1057 Launch of East Kilbride Mail (lodged on 17 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Rosie Kane*, Robert Brown*
S2M-1057 Launch of East Kilbride Mail (lodged on 17 March 2004) Robin Harper*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1057 Launch of East Kilbride Mail (lodged on 17 March 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1057 Launch of East Kilbride Mail (lodged on 17 March 2004) Linda Fabiani*
